description:
WebSite-Watcher detects website updates for you and highlights all changes in the text.

WebSite-Watcher is a powerful yet simple website-monitoring tool, perfectly suited to the beginner and advanced user alike. This software places you in complete control over what gets checked, when it gets checked, and even how you are notified.

- Monitor websites and RSS feeds
- Monitor pages for keywords
- Highlights all changes
- Many powerful features to automate your daily tasks
